Translation Guide for Menus
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS: FAQ (basic essentials, read this first!): Translation Guide for Menus
By Lisa Shock on Monday, October 8, 2007 - 09:29 pm:

Under Construction!

This guide is not intended to teach anyone Japanese! Our goal is to simply show what the menus in each area show, along with a few tips. We will not be translating the entire game.

Monster Data screens
(Work in Progress!!)

Screen 1
Monster Data 1
Name: oooooooo
Monster: (breedname) KXK
Age: (X years Y Months) Rank: (E-S)
Body Shape: (something) Temperment: (something)
Likes: (likes..) Loyalty: (00)
Dislikes: (hates..) Fame: (100)
